attributes.action: reduce summer holidays to 4 weeks but increase the chrismas holiday by the 2-3 weeks taken off the summer holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my children have 7 weeks off this summer holidays which is too long for any child, but can be even worse with child who have behavioural and learn difficulties and both of mine do. i would like to see less time in the summer and maybe more time at christmas as this is the period when children may get to see relatives they dont see all year round, so is good for their social interaction.
